text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, mm, yeah, and you know what, Mom! 
I have fans too now!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I even got a letter saying 
"Your running is an inspiration"! 
Right? I feel a little more like dad!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
……? Huh? Sorry Mom, the reception's bad. 
What did you say…? …―!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe… that's right～♪ I'm everyone's
beloved horsegirl now, I'll chase
after my shining dreams until the day a
brocade adorns my chest.…… ehehe～♪
